name: Trek: Travel Around the World
description: In Trek: Travel Around the World, the adventure starts in your new Helsinki apartment. Each experience after that transports you to a new destination where real-world locations are blended with magical phenomenon!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 GPU (or equivalent) Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i5 4670 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 GPU (or equivalent) Storage: 5 GB available space
